sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable, interval, map } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { interval$!: Observable; tableau: string[] = ["Hello tu vas bien?", "Je suis pair", "Je suis impair"]; currentIndex = 0; ngOnInit() { this.interval$ = interval(5000).pipe( map(() => { const currentElement = this.tableau[this.currentIndex]; this.currentIndex = (this.currentIndex + 1) % this.tableau.length; return currentElement; }) ); } }

{{ interval$ | async}}
